coindescs.desc:
[OnSucceedAttackHead] Randomly select one of the following effects: Burn, Bleed, Tremor, Rupture, or Sinking. Then, inflict 1 Potency of the selected effect next turn.
Repeat the above process (2 + (Highest Glut. A-Reson.)) times. (5 times max)

[OnSucceedAttackHead] Randomly select one of the following effects: Burn, Bleed, Tremor, Rupture, or Sinking. Then, inflict 1 Potency of the selected effect next turn.
Repeat the above process (2 + (Highest Glut. A-Reson.)) times. (5 times max)

[EnemyKill] Randomly select one of the following effects: 1 Poise Count, 1 Charge Count, 1 Haste, 1 Offense Level Up, or 1 Defense Level Up. Then, apply the selected effect to 2 random allies next turn

[OnSucceedAttack] Randomly select one of the following effects: Burn, Bleed, Tremor, Rupture, or Sinking. Then, inflict 1 Potency of the selected effect next turn.
Repeat the above process (2 + (Highest Glut. A-Reson.)) times. (7 times max)

[EnemyKill] Randomly select one of the following effects: 2 Poise Count, 2 Charge Count, 2 Haste, 2 Offense Level Up, or 2 Defense Level Up. Then, apply the selected effect to 2 random allies next turn

levelList.name: Lanetli Mühimmat
levelList.desc:
[BeforeAttack] (En yüksek Rez. + 1) [BoseProjektil] kazan (En fazla 7)
- Eğer Rez., M-Rez. ise, (En yüksek Rez. +2) [BoseProjektil] kazan
[BeforeAttack] Her [BoseProjektil] için 1 [Breath] kazan (En fazla 3)
[EndSkill] Bütün [BoseProjektil]'leri kaybet

coindescs.desc: Her [BoseProjektil] için Kritikal Vuruşta +5% daha fazla hasar ver (En fazla 35%)
[CriticalTargetKill] Eğer bu birimde [Bullet] efekti varsa, 1 [Bullet] kazan (Karşılaşmada 2 kere)

levelList.name: Asymmetrical Inertia
levelList.desc:
[BeforeAttack] Gain (highest Reson.) [Vibration] Count (max 6, 20 per turn)
- If the said Reson. was a Sloth Reson., trigger [Switch_Vibration] on [Vibration] on self into [VibrationSpring]

coindescs.desc:
[OnSucceedAttack] Trigger [VibrationExplosion]; then, reduce target's [Vibration] Count by 1
- When triggering Tremor Burst, inflict 1 [AmberTakeDamageUp] this turn
- If the highest Reson. was a 4+ Sloth A-Reson., inflict 1 [AmberTakeDamageUp] next turn as well
